title: Bahrain: Citi FACT Dining Award Winners Announced
summary: Manama, Bahrain - The winners of the Citi FACT Dining Awards 2013 were announced in a glamorous awards ceremony at the Lanterns Lounge and Restaurant on Tuesday, November 26, 2013. Citi and FACT magazine hosted the event, which brought together all the key players in the dining and leisure scene in Bahrain for an evening of dinner and entertainment.
tag-1: Bahrain: Citi FACT Dining Award Winners Announced
tag-2: Manama, Bahrain – The winners of the Citi FACT Dining Awards 2013 were announced in a glamorous awards ceremony at the Lanterns Lounge and Restaurant on Tuesday, November 26, 2013. Citi and FACT magazine hosted the event, which brought together all the key players in the dining and leisure scene in Bahrain for an evening of dinner and entertainment.
tag-3: In the run up to the awards, 30,000 votes were received through online and voting forms distributed throughout the country. Winners were announced across 19 categories, including the most coveted prize of "Bahrain's Favorite Restaurant."
tag-4: Navneet Kampani, Head of Consumer Bank at Citi Bahrain, said: "It gives us great pleasure to join hands with FACT magazine for the fourth year in a row and jointly host the Citi Fact Dining Awards. The growing popularity of the awards is a testimony of the successful partnership. It was indeed a pleasure to witness the ceremony and host our guests at this fun-filled event."
tag-6: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-7: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
